Package se.swedenconnect.bankid.idp.config

package se.swedenconnect.bankid.idp.config
Configuration of the Swedish eID Reference IdP.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    se.swedenconnect.bankid.idp
    The BankID SAML IdP.
    se.swedenconnect.bankid.idp.config.session
    Session handling configuration.
    se.swedenconnect.bankid.idp.config.tomcat
    Optional Tomcat configuration.

    Class
    Description
    BankIdConfiguration
    BankID IdP configuration.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties
    BankID configuration properties.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.AuditConfiguration
    Audit logging configuration.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.HealthConfiguration
    Configuration for health endpoints.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.IdpConfiguration
    Configuration of the IdP.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.RelyingPartyConfiguration
    Configuration for a relying party.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.RelyingPartyConfiguration.RpUserMessage
    For configuring user messages per RP.
    BankIdConfigurationProperties.SessionConfiguration
    Session handling configuration.
    BankIdRequirement
    Configuration for specific RP BankID requirements.
    CsrfCookieFilter
    Filter responsible for setting CSRFToken Header in response
    OverrideConfiguration
    Configurations for front-end UI overrides.
    OverrideProperties
    Configuration properties for UI overrides.
    RedisTlsProperties
    Spring Boot's Redis support does not enable us to configure SSL/TLS against the Redis server in a good way.
    RedisTlsProperties.KeyStoreConfiguration
    Configuration for a KeyStore.
    ResilienceConfiguration
    Configuration for setting up the Resilience4j beans.
    UiProperties
    Configuration properties concerning the BankID IdP UI (including texts displayed in the BankID app).
    UiProperties.ApplicationProviderProperties
    Configuration properties for the application/service provider.
    UiProperties.QrCodeConfiguration
    QR code configuration.
    UiProperties.UserErrorProperties
    Configuration properties for information to display to the user when errors have occurred.
    UiProperties.UserMessageProperties
    Texts to display during authentication and signature.
    WebMvcConfiguration
    Web MVC configuration.
